recipe.name: Butterscotch Balls [editor's title]
recipe.notes: Edna apparently figured the recipe to be self-explanatory as I am unable to find a title on this one.  A close cousin to peanut butter haystacks, but without the chow mein noodles.  Who doesn't love peanut butter and chocolate?I mean, besides people for whom peanuts mean a trip to the hospital?
recipe.preparation: Melt together butterscotch chips and peanut butter in a double boiler.Drop on wax paper.
